sn51.11:4.2: “Pubbeva me, bhikkhave, sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato etadahosi:
sn51.11:4.3: ‘ko nu kho hetu, ko paccayo iddhipādabhāvanāyā’ti?
sn51.11:4.6: iti me chando na ca atilīno bhavissati, na ca atippaggahito bhavissati, na ca ajjhattaṃ saṃkhitto bhavissati, na ca bahiddhā vikkhitto bhavissati.
sn51.11:4.8: yathā pure tathā pacchā, yathā pacchā tathā pure;
sn51.11:4.9: yathā adho tathā uddhaṃ, yathā uddhaṃ tathā adho;
sn51.11:4.10: yathā divā tathā rattiṃ, yathā rattiṃ tathā divā.
sn51.11:4.11: Iti vivaṭena cetasā apariyonaddhena sappabhāsaṃ cittaṃ bhāveti’.
sn51.11:5.2: iti me vīriyaṃ na ca atilīnaṃ bhavissati, na ca atippaggahitaṃ bhavissati, na ca ajjhattaṃ saṅkhittaṃ bhavissati, na ca bahiddhā vikkhittaṃ bhavissati.
sn51.11:5.4: yathā pure tathā pacchā, yathā pacchā tathā pure;
sn51.11:5.5: yathā adho tathā uddhaṃ, yathā uddhaṃ tathā adho;
sn51.11:5.6: yathā divā tathā rattiṃ, yathā rattiṃ tathā divā.
sn51.11:5.7: Iti vivaṭena cetasā apariyonaddhena sappabhāsaṃ cittaṃ bhāveti.
sn51.11:6.2: iti me cittaṃ na ca atilīnaṃ bhavissati, na ca atippaggahitaṃ bhavissati, na ca ajjhattaṃ saṅkhittaṃ bhavissati, na ca bahiddhā vikkhittaṃ bhavissati.
sn51.11:6.4: yathā pure tathā pacchā, yathā pacchā tathā pure;
sn51.11:6.5: yathā adho tathā uddhaṃ, yathā uddhaṃ tathā adho;
sn51.11:6.6: yathā divā tathā rattiṃ, yathā rattiṃ tathā divā.
sn51.11:6.7: Iti vivaṭena cetasā apariyonaddhena sappabhāsaṃ cittaṃ bhāveti.
sn51.11:7.2: iti me vīmaṃsā na ca atilīnā bhavissati, na ca atippaggahitā bhavissati, na ca ajjhattaṃ saṅkhittā bhavissati, na ca bahiddhā vikkhittā bhavissati.
sn51.11:7.4: yathā pure tathā pacchā, yathā pacchā tathā pure;
sn51.11:7.5: yathā adho tathā uddhaṃ, yathā uddhaṃ tathā adho;
sn51.11:7.6: yathā divā tathā rattiṃ, yathā rattiṃ tathā divā.
sn51.11:7.7: Iti vivaṭena cetasā apariyonaddhena sappabhāsaṃ cittaṃ bhāveti.
sn51.11:8.1: Evaṃ bhāvitesu kho, bhikkhu, catūsu iddhipādesu evaṃ bahulīkatesu, anekavihitaṃ iddhividhaṃ paccanubhoti—
sn51.11:8.2: ekopi hutvā bahudhā hoti, bahudhāpi hutvā eko hoti;
sn51.11:8.4: tirokuṭṭaṃ tiropākāraṃ tiropabbataṃ asajjamāno gacchati, seyyathāpi ākāse;
sn51.11:8.6: udakepi abhijjamāne gacchati, seyyathāpi pathaviyaṃ;
sn51.11:8.7: ākāsepi pallaṅkena kamati, seyyathāpi pakkhī sakuṇo;
sn51.11:8.8: imepi candimasūriye evaṃmahiddhike evaṃmahānubhāve pāṇinā parimasati parimajjati;
sn51.11:9.1: Evaṃ bhāvitesu kho, bhikkhu, catūsu iddhipādesu evaṃ bahulīkatesu dibbāya sotadhātuyā visuddhāya atikkantamānusikāya ubho sadde suṇāti—
sn51.11:9.2: dibbe ca mānuse ca, dūre santike cāti.
sn51.11:10.1: Evaṃ bhāvitesu kho, bhikkhu, catūsu iddhipādesu evaṃ bahulīkatesu, parasattānaṃ parapuggalānaṃ cetasā ceto paricca pajānāti.
sn51.11:11.1: Evaṃ bhāvitesu kho, bhikkhu, catūsu iddhipādesu evaṃ bahulīkatesu, anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussarati, seyyathidaṃ—
sn51.11:11.2: ekampi jātiṃ dvepi jātiyo tissopi jātiyo catassopi jātiyo pañcapi jātiyo dasapi jātiyo vīsampi jātiyo tiṃsampi jātiyo cattālīsampi jātiyo paññāsampi jātiyo jātisatampi jātisahassampi jātisatasahassampi anekepi saṃvaṭṭakappe anekepi vivaṭṭakappe anekepi saṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭakappe:
sn51.11:11.3: ‘amutrāsiṃ evaṃnāmo evaṅgotto evaṃvaṇṇo evamāhāro evaṃsukhadukkhappaṭisaṃvedī evamāyupariyanto, so tato cuto amutra udapādiṃ;
sn51.11:11.4: tatrāpāsiṃ evaṃnāmo evaṅgotto evaṃvaṇṇo evamāhāro evaṃsukhadukkhappaṭisaṃvedī evamāyupariyanto, so tato cuto idhūpapanno’ti.
sn51.11:11.5: Iti sākāraṃ sauddesaṃ anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussarati.
sn51.11:12.1: Evaṃ bhāvitesu kho, bhikkhu, catūsu iddhipādesu evaṃ bahulīkatesu, dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena satte passati cavamāne upapajjamāne hīne paṇīte suvaṇṇe dubbaṇṇe, sugate duggate yathākammūpage satte pajānāti:
sn51.11:12.2: ‘ime vata, bhonto, sattā kāyaduccaritena samannāgatā vacīduccaritena samannāgatā manoduccaritena samannāgatā ariyānaṃ upavādakā micchādiṭṭhikā micchādiṭṭhikammasamādānā;
sn51.11:12.3: te kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapannā.
sn51.11:12.4: Ime vā pana, bhonto, sattā kāyasucaritena samannāgatā vacīsucaritena samannāgatā manosucaritena samannāgatā ariyānaṃ anupavādakā sammādiṭṭhikā sammādiṭṭhikammasamādānā;
sn51.11:12.5: te kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapannā’ti.
sn51.11:12.6: Iti dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena satte passati cavamāne upapajjamāne hīne paṇīte, suvaṇṇe dubbaṇṇe, sugate duggate yathākammūpage satte pajānāti.
sn51.11:13.1: Evaṃ bhāvitesu kho, bhikkhu, catūsu iddhipādesu evaṃ bahulīkatesu, āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharatī”ti.
